definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: How would a new round of trade liberalization help poor countries?
sentences.chinese: 新一轮的贸易自由化将如何帮助贫困国家呢？

sentences.english: We need to continue the liberalizing of international trade.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要继续把国际贸易自由化。

sentences.english: Trade liberalization was put forward as a sure route to prosperity for developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 贸易自由化被视为发展中国家致富的必由之路。

sentences.english: First, promote trade and investment liberalization and facilitation with strong determination.
sentences.chinese: 第一，坚定立场，积极推动贸易和投资自由化便利化。

sentences.english: Liberalisation should lower food prices by cutting out middle men and waste.
sentences.chinese: 自由化应该通过削减中产阶级和浪费来降低食品价格。

sentences.english: How many sectors are involved in the "EVSL" process ?
sentences.chinese: 有多少加入了“自愿提前自由化”进程？

sentences.english: Japan sets up "the government form of Fifth Five-Year Plan Period" after the war, requires educational liberalization.
sentences.chinese: 日本战后建立“五五政体”，要求教育自由化。

sentences.english: The liberalization of international trade and investment has incresingly become the driving force for economic globalization since the 1980's.
sentences.chinese: 投资自由化是经济全球化的重要动力机制。

sentences.english: They should also demonstrate in favor of liberalizing the economy and completing the Doha Development Round.
sentences.chinese: 他们应该支持经济自由化和完成多哈发展回合的政策。

sentences.english: Bourgeois liberalization, I am the one who has talked about it most often and most insistently.
sentences.chinese: 反对资产阶级自由化，我讲得最多，而且我最坚持。

sentences.english: But economic liberty can't be doled out like dim sum at a reception.
sentences.chinese: 但经济自由化并非招待会上分发的点心。

sentences.english: Privatisations and some limited liberalisation are planned.
sentences.chinese: 计划实现私有化和一定程度上的有限自由化。

sentences.english: Currently, the freeness of trade and investment has been an inreverasal trend.
sentences.chinese: 目前，贸易和投资自由化已成为不可逆转的国际潮流。

sentences.english: Trade liberalization is the engine of economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 贸易自由化是经济增长的发动机。

sentences.english: Trade and investment liberalization and facilitation is an engine of economic development in the Asia Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 贸易和投资自由化便利化是亚太地区经济发展的动力。

sentences.english: Beijing has also halted progress in price liberalization made during the first two decades of reform.
sentences.chinese: 北京还停止了改革头二十年期间所进行的价格自由化。
